directions: In a large saucepan or stock pot, mix together the apple cider vinegar, brown sugar, onion, jalapeno pepper, garlic and black pepper. Simmer over medium heat for at least 15 minutes.  Use as a basting sauce, or add beef or pork ribs, and simmer for 1 hour, or until the meat falls off the bone.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
title: Tangy Sweet then Hot
